Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory1.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "I've sent you the enemy's route.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you.', 3: '7', 4: 'Is it really safe to stay that long in a Corrupted zone?', 5: '8'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Don't mention it.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Yep. After my Inver-Device was upgraded, my Mind Beacon became less sensitive than Gray Raven's. In other words, I can operate independently for longer periods of time than other Constructs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds impressive.', 3: '10', 4: 'But you still need to be careful.', 5: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Just trying to better complete the mission.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "As the leader, I know what I'm doing. Don't you worry about me, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "How's Kamui doing? Still sticking to the plan, I hope?", 4: '1'}
{2: "He's doing fine.", 3: '14', 4: 'For now, yes.', 5: '14'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "That's good then.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "...Well, Commandant, I've got some business to take care of.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'll end the connection here then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, strong energy fluctuation at eleven o'clock!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Prepare for combat with the intel from Strike Hawk leader.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stick to the plan.', 3: '987'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Commandant, don't you feel like something's missing here?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'What?', 3: '28', 4: "Where's Kamui? He's supposed to be back from recon.", 5: '31'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Kamui's physical presence has become as elusive as his intellect.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...Oh! Where did Kamui go?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I suggest we tread carefully before we find him. There's no telling where the next bullet we fire will end up.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, can you connect with Kamui now?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{2: "Looks like there's no need to look for him.", 3: '39'}

{3: 'A greatsword flies out from a window in a nearby building, drawing an arch in the air before planting itself deep in the ground. The next moment, a familiar-looking figure leaps down and lands steadily next to the sword.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant! Guys! There you are!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'C-Commandant, the fluctuations in the area are gone...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh, I just took care of all of the Corrupted ahead. How about that!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Great job.', 3: '51', 4: 'Prepare to get an earful.', 5: '52'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Heh heh, with Commandant backing me up, I have nothing to worry about!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Chrome must have nerves of tantalum to stand having Kamui in his squad.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Commandant, I just detected Kamui's signal along the enemy's route. What's going on?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ahem...', 3: '60', 4: 'He took care of all of the Corrupted.', 5: '63'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "...Are you safe right now? Where's Kamui?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'll be there in five minutes. Hold on.", 4: '1'}
{2: "We're fine.", 3: '65', 4: 'Kamui has dealt with the threat.', 5: '67'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'In a... conventional manner?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You could say that.', 3: '67', 4: 'Tangentially speaking.', 5: '67'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Are you sure? As the commandant, you should report the situation as it is.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't worry. Kamui has taken care of the enemies.", 3: '67'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant, put in a good word for me!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Please ignore him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'He fought bravely.', 3: '74', 4: "You're too hard on him.", 5: '75'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Are you sure he acted according to the mission plan?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "It's for his own good and for the good of Strike Hawk.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "But since you put it that way, I'll give him the benefit of doubt.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'll admit it. Kamui is good at handling certain situations.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I agree.', 3: '79', 4: 'You know your team members well.', 5: '80'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Yes, so that I can make the best use of their talent. Given the right command, Kamui can do his job well.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Leadership is about getting the right people to do the right job.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'And so do you, am I right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Pride goes before a fall. Try to draw lessons from what happened today.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Don't forget your promise, leader!", 4: '1'}
